channel.title: Data on inVisement
channel.description: Recent content in Data on inVisement

item.title: How to access invisement data
item.description: Available Datasets basic/company.csv (view or download) Includes a basic information about companies. Columns: [ticker, cik, irs, name, sic, state] sec/CIK.csv Consolidated financial data submitted by company in 10-K and 10-Q forms. columns: [tag, date, qtrs, value, unit] q/TICKER.csv Quarterly data about core financial indicators for each company. columns: [tag, period, value, unit, date] y/TICKER.csv Yearly data about core financial indicators for each company by.
